DOC.brief_summary: Objectives 1. To characterize mechanical ventilation practices during general anesthesia for surgery 2. To assess the dependence of intra-operative and post-operative pulmonary complications on intra-operative Mechanical Ventilation (MV) settings
DOC.brief_title: Local Assessment of Ventilatory Management During General Anesthesia for Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Research questions - What MV-settings are used during general anesthesia for surgery? - Do MV-settings vary in and/or between centers? - Do MV-settings vary internationally? - Are MV-settings associated with incidence of intra-operative pulmonary complications? - Are MV-settings associated with incidence of post-operative pulmonary complications?
